## TileDataSource.(constructor)

Set up the `TileDataSource`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  m\_tileFactory | [TileFactory](./harp-mapview-decoder.tilefactory.md)<!-- -->&lt;TileType&gt; | Factory to create the \[\[Tile\]\] instances. |
